<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Batch update custom field types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/types/update/batch"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple custom field types in a single request. This endpoint is useful for bulk configuration changes across multiple custom field definitions.

**Prerequisites**:
1. **CustomFieldTypeIds** - Obtain type UUIDs from [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types](/docs/api/custom-fields/list-custom-field-types) or [POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-field-types)

**Workflow Example**:
1. List custom field types to identify which types to update
2. For each type to update, include its CustomFieldTypeId and the properties to change
3. Submit all updates in a single POST request
4. Review the returned Items array to verify all updates were applied

**Minimal Required Fields**: Array with at least one update object containing CustomFieldTypeId and properties to update

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"Array of custom field type definitions to update in bulk. Each item must include CustomFieldTypeId and the properties to update.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for updating an existing custom field type definition. Based on CustomFieldType model.","properties":{"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the custom field type to update"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the custom field type","example":"Serial Number"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Detailed description of the field's purpose"},"EditorTypeId":{"type":"integer","description":"Editor type for rendering (1=Text, 2=Number, 3=Date, etc.)"},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Site","Product","Global"],"description":"Visibility scope"},"IsRequired":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the field is required by default"},"IsHidden":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the field is hidden from users"},"IsReadOnly":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the field is read-only"},"DisplayOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Display order for the field"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product this field type belongs to"}},"required":["CustomFieldTypeId"],"title":"CustomFieldTypeUpdateRequest"},"minItems":1,"example":[{"CustomFieldTypeId":"027d9a34-c8b0-4dd3-86d9-badc9b95c547","Name":"Updated Equipment Type","IsRequired":true,"DisplayOrder":5},{"CustomFieldTypeId":"e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089","IsHidden":true}],"title":"CustomFieldTypeBatchUpdateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
